00106 #ifdef OS_WINDOWS
00107 #include <windows.h>
00108 typedef long long Clock;        
00109 #else
00110 #include <sys/time.h>
00111 #include <sys/resource.h>
00112 typedef struct timeval Clock;   
00113 #endif
00114 
00119 static inline void ClockStart(Clock * const c)
00120 {
00121 #ifdef OS_WINDOWS
00122     QueryPerformanceCounter((LARGE_INTEGER *) c);
00123 #else
00124     gettimeofday(c, NULL);  
00125 #endif
00126 }
00127 
00139 static inline double ClockElapsed(Clock * const c)
00140 {
00141 #ifdef OS_WINDOWS
00142     long long end;
00143     long long freq;
00144     QueryPerformanceCounter((LARGE_INTEGER *) &end);
00145     QueryPerformanceFrequency((LARGE_INTEGER *) &freq);    
00146     return ((double) (end - (*c))) / freq; 
00147 #else
00148     struct timeval end;
00149     gettimeofday(&end, NULL);      
00150     return  (end.tv_sec  - c->tv_sec ) +  0.000001 * (end.tv_usec - c->tv_usec);    
00151 #endif      
00152 }

00171 #ifdef OS_WINDOWS
00172   #define srandom srand
00173   #define random rand
00174   #define RANDOM_MAX RAND_MAX
00175   static inline int long round(const double x)
00176   {
00177     return ((long) floor((x) + 0.5));
00178   }
00179 #else
00180   #define RANDOM_MAX 2147483647
00181 #endif
00182 
00191 static inline void PseudoRandomSeed(const unsigned int s)
00192 {
00193     srandom(s);    
00194 }
00195 
00206 static inline unsigned int PseudoRandomSeed(void)
00207 {
00208     FILE        *fp = fopen("/dev/urandom", "r");    
00209     unsigned int s;
00210     
00211     if(fp != NULL)
00212     {
00213         fread(&s, sizeof(unsigned int), 1, fp);    
00214         fclose(fp);             
00215     }
00216     else
00217         s = (unsigned int) time(NULL);
00218     
00219     printf("using seed: %u\n", s);
00220     
00221     PseudoRandomSeed(s);
00222     
00223     return s;
00224 }

00226 
00227 
00232 static inline double PseudoRandomUniformReal(void)
00233 {
00234     return ((double) random()) / ((double) RANDOM_MAX);
00235 }
00236 
00244 static inline double PseudoRandomUniformReal(const double min, const double max)
00245 {
00246     return min + (max - min) * PseudoRandomUniformReal();
00247 }
00248 
00256 static inline long PseudoRandomUniformInteger(const long min, const long max)
00257 {
00258     const long x = (long) round(min - 0.5 + (max - min + 1) * PseudoRandomUniformReal()); 
00259     return x > max ? max : (x < min ? min : x);
00260 }
